parameters.query:
WITH 
  client_ref AS 
  (
  SELECT * FROM input1
  ),
  project as 
  (
  select * from input3
  ),
  time_entry  AS
  (
  select
    client_ref.id AS client_id, 
    client_ref.name AS client_name,
    client_ref.record_id AS client_record_id,
    project.record_id AS proj_record_id,
    project.id AS project_id, 
    project.name AS proj_name,
    input2.id AS time_entry_id,
    input2.*
  from input2
    INNER JOIN project ON project.id = input2.project_id
    LEFT JOIN client_ref ON client_ref.id = project.client_id
  )
select * from time_entry;

parameters.content:

WITH

  SELECT * FROM input1
  ),
  project as 
  (
  select * from input3
  ),
  time_entry  AS
  (
  select
    client_ref.id AS client_id, 
    client_ref.name AS client_name,
    client_ref.record_id AS client_record_id,
    project.record_id AS proj_record_id,
    project.id AS project_id, 
    project.name AS proj_name,
    input2.id AS time_entry_id,
    input2.*
  from input2
    INNER JOIN project ON project.id = input2.project_id
    LEFT JOIN client_ref ON client_ref.id = project.client_id
  )
select * from time_entry;
